lenders.name: frank
lenders.loan_because:
I hope to raise recurring residual streams in the future to fund projects like this and others. I believe everyone can make a difference even if it is only a small donation at first. If we recognize where help is most needed and we address those issues without discrimination we stand a good chance in making real development growth possible. I donate because I want to donate, not because I have to? I have created an article that may bring in commissions which if set on an autopilot system, and correct payment processors are in place, this could very well be what I have pursued to create. 

http://www.dofollowuntacticcal000.com/Mass_Articles/Changing Lives In The Manner Of Creating A Purpose0.pdf
lenders.occupational_info: In simply recognizing that there is a much greater need for those of us who have access to online tools and secured systems, to make a concerted effort towards changing lives with the hope that we can one day finally eradicate poverty. Even now as I am a self-made homeless man on the streets of Perth in Western Australia, I recognize the importance of donating and micro-financing, it is the future of all our people for the future. http://au.news.yahoo.com/thewest/a/-/wa/9098758/photo-helps-widower-get-back-on-feet/

"Wat je bezit is op weg naar anderen" 
"Whatever you own today is already on its way to someone else"
(Dutch poet  Willem Hussem, translated into English by me)
*****
Running a small business myself, I can't but feel deep respect and admiration for all those brave women who do the same in much more difficult circumstances.

lenders.name: Noah

lenders.name: Project2000International
lenders.loan_because:
We run the same program in Haiti and it had a tremendous impact in the lives of those not able to access the credit market. We are currently mobilizing funds for our projects in Haiti, if you can, please make a donation. If not, forward our request to your lists on our behalf. 

Project 2000 International, Inc. has its core service as education. We believe that if people are educated, opportunities will result. We have now began to grow beyond our core service by providing health services, agricultural education, micro-credit and training schools in order to develop a sustainable entrepreneurial revolution in Haiti. Please, help us in securing funding for our programs. We are a 501c3 organization; your donations are tax deductible. 

http://www.project2000international.org/eng_agriculture.htm 

http://www.project2000international.org/eng_credit.htm
lenders.occupational_info: Very rewarding in seeing the difference that so little can make.

lenders.name: Micha
lenders.loan_because:
I'm a convinced liberal and as a member of a liberal party in The Netherlands I find it very importent that people will develop themselves to become living a better life.
Allmost every western country has a specific budget for development. In many cases this money will not reach the people where it is needed for. Therefor I find this a very good initiative. As an individual I can first of all choose my own project and secondly the money will go to that person to start her/his business to get a better life.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am working as an Account Manager (small business) for the Rabobank
Key Accountabilities / Activities:
To relationship manage a portfolio of small business customers by meeting the total banking needs of the customer, both personal and business. The portfolio will primarily contain small business customers whose business needs are generally straightforward. Typical small businesses managed at this level would include: small to medium sized agriculture operations; small to medium sized franchises; businesses with one or two locations; many professionals and small trades. Meet the personal needs of these small business customers, which may range from simple to complex, by profiling, referring, promoting, selling, cross-selling, up selling and delivering a full range of personal banking products and services, including several sophisticated products.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because:
I think, the idea of micro finance is much more helpful than anonymous donations. 
Besides that I find it fascinating to contribute to a small project in another part of the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am working for a payment service company, responsible for the ISO 9000 compliancy.
